text: Gopi Chand Narang (11 February 1931 â€“ 15 June 2022) was an Indian theorist, literary critic, and scholar who wrote in Urdu and English. His Urdu literary criticism incorporated a range of modern theoretical frameworks including stylistics, structuralism, post-structuralism, and Eastern poetics. Narang died on 15 June 2022 in Charlotte, North Carolina, United States at the age of 91.Prof Gopi Chand Narang, ambassador of Urdu world, dies at 91 ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Indian academics
title: Gopi Chand Narang
